results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: coefficient [x^k] of the polynomial Product_{i=1..n} (x + q^i) in row n and q = 3.
comment: Triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by [3,6,27,72,243,702,2187,6480,...] DELTA [1,0,3,0,9,0,27,0,81,0,243,0,...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 01 2011
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: p(x,n,q) = 1 if n=0, Product_{i=1..n} (x + q^i) otherwise, with q=3.
mathematica: p[x_, n_, q_] = If[n==0, 1, Product[x + q^i, {i, 1, n}]];
Table[CoefficientList[p[x, n, 3], x], {n, 0, 10}] (* modified by _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 20 2021 *)
program: flatten([[T(n,k,3) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..10)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 20 2021
if k lt 0 or k gt n then return 0;
elif k eq n then return 1;
end if; return T; end function;
